title: The Shushan Citadel
description: Situated along the Great Lakes, three subterranean cities designed to resist global terrorism survive a devastating planetary disaster: Shushan, corporate headquarters of an international communications network, Abbey Trádún, an island monastery, and DúndirkaNoka, an Aboriginal settlement. After the Devastation, Shushan’s CEO builds a Citadel and arrogantly sets out to rule the land in the style of King Ahasuerus of the Book of Esther – harem and all. Intelligence forces within the three cities plant a young Jewish woman in the Citadel to win the heart of the delusional dictator.iBook: USA https://itunes.apple.com/us/book/shus... and Canada https://itunes.apple.com/ca/book/shus...
author: Gloria Pearson-Vasey
